summary: An emotional apology website for 'aafu' with heartfelt design and messaging

existing_features.title: Create a single-page frontend that displays an emotional apology message addressed to 'Aafu' with heartfelt, sincere content that conveys remorse and affection

Design the frontend with a warm, emotional visual theme that uses soft, romantic colors (such as pastels, warm tones, or gentle gradients), elegant typography, and a layout that creates an intimate, heartfelt atmosphere appropriate for a sincere apology
Render the generated background image as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated to create an emotional visual backdrop for the apology

Add a photo gallery section to the apology page that displays the 8 uploaded user photos (Snapchat-1302406921.jpg, Snapchat-818160405.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-1.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-1.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-2.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-2.jpg, Snapchat-1302406921-3.jpg, Snapchat-818160405-3.jpg) in an elegant layout that complements the existing emotional theme

Display the message 'forever yours with love bablet' prominently on the apology page in a position that feels intimate and personal, using typography that matches the emotional tone of the existing content

new_feature_requests.summary: Create emotional apology website with heartfelt messaging for 'aafu'
Add user-provided photos to the apology website
Display the message 'forever yours with love bablet' on the page
